entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
